value.title: Introducing New Format Pane in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: During this video, we will talk about the new format pane in Power BI Desktop. Now we have consistent and easier formatting experience for our Power BI report. During this video, I will demonstrate all-new enhancements that has been rolled out as New format pane preview. We will also compare the new

value.title: Introducing New Shapes with Customize shape formatting
value.excerpt: During this video, we will talk about newly introduced shapes in Power BI. Introducing New Shapes in Power BI with Conditional formatting. Now, we can apply shape formatting in a dynamic manner in Power BI. To apply, shape formatting, we need to apply conditional formatting like other Power BI visuals.
